title: Video Of Eid Shopping At Mumbai or Pakistan? A FactCheck
subtitle: The video was earlier viral as social distancing norms flouted in Hyderabad.
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
The video of a crowded market shared as 'Today Mohamad ali road Mumbai'

BOOM found that the video is from Anarkali bazaar in Faisalabad city, Pakistan where guidelines for the COVID-19 lockdown were relaxed earlier this week. We had previously fact checked the same video when it was viral claiming it shows crowds shopping and not following social distancing norms at Madina market in Hyderabad. A board of a local shop - Aini Shoes - written in Urdu text is visible in the video. A search for Aini Shoes showed results for a store in Faisalabad, Pakistan, located inside the Anarkali Bazaar, a market in the city,
